title: Big Changes Are Coming (Ep 1676)
description:
Big changes are coming. Big tech’s war on free speech is finally coming back to haunt them. In this episode, I address the latest breaking news about this critical fight. 

News Picks:

The exodus from the big tech tyrants is picking up steam. 


Senator Schumer is threatening to blow up the Senate rules to pass radical voting laws. 


Six data-points that blow up the prevailing COVID narratives.


There’s growing pushback against the ridiculous term “LatinX.” 

ABC lib gets instantly fact-checked about election claims.

Teacher’s unions are preparing to screw over your kids again.
